# The Art of Shrinking Heads

The Art of Shrinking Heads: The New Servitude of the Liberated in the Era of Total Capitalism () is a 2003 book by the French writer Dany-Robert Dufour. It is a critical examination of post-war liberalism, and what Dufour describes as a tendence in neoliberal capitalism of trying to create its own New Man. The book appeared in English translation by David Macey through Polity.
